New paper shows AI art models don't need art training data to make recognizable artistic work.

AI is a great tool in the creative process. Here's the original photo. AI was able to generate many iterations for inspiration. For the final art, each student was hand drawn to match the photo in the OCM art style.

Digital art is shifting from muscle memory to articulated thought.

For decades, creation relied on mastering tools, layers, shortcuts, understanding blending modes and training the hand to execute what the mind saw.. 

Now, the barrier between idea and execution has vanished.
